StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: NHLBI TOPMed: Study of Asthma Phenotypes and Pharmacogenomic Interactions by Race-Ethnicity (SAPPHIRE)

Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS AT CHICAGOUNIVERSITY OF CHICAGO

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The TOPMed acknowledgement statement can be found at: https://topmed.nhlbi.nih.gov/acknowledgements. In addition, please include: "The creation of the Study of Asthma Phenotypes and Pharmacogenomic Interactions by Race-Ethnicity (SAPPHIRE) cohort was made possible by grant funding from the Fund for Henry Ford Hospital, the American Asthma Foundation, and the U.S. National Institutes of Health (NIH), National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute (NHLBI) grants R01 HL118267 and X01 HL134589, and the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) grant R01 AI079139."
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: There is only one consent group for this study: HMB-COL, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (COL)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-COL
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).

ConsentGroup.title: Exchange Area (COL)
ConsentGroup.name: EA-COL
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use by NHLBI WGS study investigators only. There is only one consent group for this study: HMB-COL.Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes,does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).

StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: NHLBI TOPMed: Study of Asthma Phenotypes and Pharmacogenomic Interactions by Race-Ethnicity (SAPPHIRE)

Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS AT CHICAGOUNIVERSITY OF CHICAGO

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The TOPMed acknowledgement statement can be found at: https://www.nhlbiwgs.org/acknowledgements. In addition, please include: "The creation of the Study of Asthma Phenotypes and Pharmacogenomic Interactions by Race-Ethnicity (SAPPHIRE) cohort was made possible by grant funding from the Fund for Henry Ford Hospital, the American Asthma Foundation, and the U.S. National Institutes of Health (NIH), National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute (NHLBI) grants R01 HL118267 and X01 HL134589, and the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) grant R01 AI079139."
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: There is only one consent group for this study: DS-ASTHMA-IRB-COL Use of the data must be related to Asthma. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval (please note only full or expedited approvals will be accepted). Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Asthma, IRB, COL)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ASTHMA-IRB-COL
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Asthma. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).

ConsentGroup.title: Exchange Area (IRB, COL)
ConsentGroup.name: EA-IRB-COL
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use by NHLBI WGS study investigators only. There is only one consent group for this study: DS-ASTHMA-IRB-COL Use of the data must be related to Asthma. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval (please note only full or expedited approvals will be accepted). Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).
